@Andrei Zaharia FYI

Automatic Updates to Model on Scheduled Basis

I just left a call with Cirque du Soleil and they asked about whether we have the ability to automatically update the platform based upon a daily update to information from their website or other data sources configured within Search AI. 

As far as I know there is not a means to accomplish this as one must click the TRAIN button to make the newly ingested information into the model. 

How can they accomplish this in an automated manner?

You can set up schedules within the Website configuration to occur daily/week/monthly or yearly. These will occur in the future for the time and date youve specified.
https://docs.kore.ai/xo/searchai/content-sources/web-crawl/

Thank you @Amar Malik.

But doesn't it still require a manual step of clicking TRAIN to make the new information available?
there is auto-train whenever there is new content. I set a schedule for the last website and once it was 3:53pm it recrawled and once successful started the auto-train

For XO 11, we don't have a limit on the number of documents. We will have a limit on the size of content based on user's plan. You can check the pricing details for more information

Essential: 100 MB
Advanced: 300 MB
Enterprise: 1 GB with 1 GB units extra if required
